casebody.data:
No. 10-10038. Jorge Gevara, aka Jorge Galeas, Petitioner v. Alvin W. Keller, Secretary, North Carolina Department of Correction, et al. 564 U.S. 1024, 131 S. Ct. 3033,

180 L. Ed. 2d 854,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 4689. June 20, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 408 Fed. Appx. 761.
